name: Disk Allocation: Typing Spectacular
description:
DISCLAIMER: THIS DOES NOT ACTUALLY DELETE FILES ON YOUR PC, THEY ARE FAKE

made for ludum dare 42 in 48 hours. check out my ldjam page!

looks like your computer is running out of space! can you delete enough files to fully allocate space for your precious hard drive??? i don't know, play the game and find out

type out the words you see on the input box (written in gray) and press enter to attack files. you can also use scripts (which are basically like spells) using the key that they're associated with. the game tells you this but i thought i'd say it here too. good luck!
